channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Building materials left in road, 7th November
item.description:
Thesevbuilding materials have been left in the road for a week now. Parking is at a premium so this is obstructing a parking space. It is also not lit or marked at night.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parish Lane, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime bikes parked in motorcycle bay, 7th November
item.description:

item.title: Fly Tipping, 7th November
item.description:
Commercial waste being left on the pavement for hours instead of being left within an allotted collection windows which is contrary to Bromley’s website and national standards. Waste and recycling must be kept on your premises (not the public pavement or street) until the permitted collection window. If your trade waste provider specifies a time, you should only move your waste to the kerbside immediately before collection

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Beckenham Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to kerb previous reference 8379628, 7th November
item.description:
